channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 迪拜环球港务集团预计从亚洲到欧洲的货物成本将更高
item.description: DP World CFO Yuvraj Narayan said on Tuesday he expected that disruptions to shipping in the Red Sea as a result of Houthi attacks on vessels would hit European consumers hardest.翻译:迪拜环球港务集团首席财务官尤夫拉吉·纳拉扬(Yuvraj Narayan)周二表示，他预计胡塞武装袭击船只造成的红海航运中断将对欧洲消费者造成最严重的打击。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 早间竞价：降息猫捉老鼠的游戏
item.description: A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan翻译:迈克·多兰 (Mike Dolan) 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 碧桂园任命毕马威为离岸债务重组顾问
item.description: Beleaguered property developer Country Garden said on Tuesday it has appointed KPMG Advisory (China) Ltd as its principal financial adviser for its offshore debt restructuring.翻译:陷入困境的房地产开发商碧桂园周二表示，已任命毕马威咨询（中国）有限公司为其境外债务重组的首席财务顾问。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 比亚迪首艘包船携5000辆电动汽车起航前往欧洲-新华网
item.description: BYD's first chartered vehicle vessel has set sail from China's southern city of Shenzhen carrying more than 5,000 electric vehicles to Europe, state media Xinhua reported on Tuesday.翻译:据官方媒体新华社周二报道，比亚迪首艘汽车包租船已从中国南方城市深圳起航，载着 5,000 多辆电动汽车前往欧洲。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 印度选手纳加尔在墨尔本取得惊人胜利后保证获得巨额奖金
item.description: Sumit Nagal, India's top-ranked singles player, was left with less than a thousand dollars in his bank account at one point last year so it was no surprise he was beaming on Tuesday after ensuring a bumper payday at the Australian Open.翻译:印度排名第一的单打选手苏米特·纳加尔(Sumit Nagal)去年的银行账户里曾一度只剩下不到一千美元，因此在确保澳大利亚网球公开赛上的丰厚发薪日后，他周二的笑容也就不足为奇了。
item.author: Shrivathsa Sridhar

item.title: 达沃斯 - 中国总理李克强：2023年中国经济增长预计为5.2%
item.description: Chinese Premier Li Qiang said on Tuesday the Chinese economy had rebounded and moved upward, and was estimated to have grown around 5.2% in 2023, above the official target of around 5%.翻译:中国国务院总理李强周二表示，中国经济已经回升上行，预计2023年增长5.2%左右，高于5%左右的官方目标。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国前国家主席之子出任副部长
item.description: Hu Haifeng, son of former Chinese President Hu Jintao, was appointed on Tuesday by the cabinet as a vice minister of civil affairs, making a leap into the senior ranks of the central government from a small city in an eastern province.翻译:中国前国家主席胡锦涛之子胡海峰周二被内阁任命为民政部副部长，从东部省份的一个小城市跃升为中央政府高层。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 大韩航空、国泰航空的飞机在日本机场折断机翼；没有受伤
item.description: Two aircraft belonging to Korean Air Lines and Cathay Pacific Airways clipped wings at New Chitose Airport on Japan's northern island of Hokkaido on Tuesday amid wintry conditions, a Korean Air official said.翻译:大韩航空一名官员表示，周二，由于寒冷的天气，大韩航空和国泰航空的两架飞机在日本北部岛屿北海道的新千岁机场发生机翼折断。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 克里姆林宫拒绝讨论彭博社有关中国银行收紧对俄罗斯人的限制的报道
item.description: The Kremlin declined to comment on Tuesday on a Bloomberg report that Chinese state-owned banks are tightening curbs on funding to Russian clients for fear of U.S. secondary sanctions, describing it as a highly sensitive topic.翻译:克里姆林宫周二拒绝对彭博社的一篇报道发表评论，该报道称，由于担心美国的二次制裁，中国国有银行正在收紧对俄罗斯客户的融资限制，称这是一个高度敏感的话题。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 周二达沃斯有什么值得期待的
item.description: The main business of the World Economic Forum kicks off on Tuesday with a speech by Chinese premier Li Qiang top of the agenda.翻译:世界经济论坛的主要议题周二拉开帷幕，中国总理李强的演讲成为首要议程。
item.author: Leela De Kretser

item.title: 韩国和美国将在美国大选前提前开始国防费用谈判-媒体
item.description: South Korea and the United States have agreed to start early talks on how to share the cost of keeping U.S. forces in the country in a bid to reach a deal before the possible reelection of Donald Trump as president, local media reported on Tuesday.翻译:据当地媒体周二报道，韩国和美国已同意就如何分担驻韩美军的成本展开早期谈判，以便在唐纳德·特朗普可能连任总统之前达成协议。
item.author: Hyonhee Shin

item.title: 一些较富裕的中国人表示，随着经济放缓，他们买不起婚姻
item.description: Victor Li is determined to get married soon, but like many other young Chinese grappling with an uncertain economic outlook, the well-heeled Shanghai entrepreneur isn't sure he can afford to.翻译:李泽钜决心尽快结婚，但像许多其他面临不确定的经济前景的中国年轻人一样，这位富有的上海企业家不确定自己是否负担得起。
item.author: Nicoco Chan

item.title: 台总理称内阁将按照以往惯例辞职
item.description: Taiwan Premier Chen Chien-jen said on Tuesday that the Cabinet will resign in accordance with past constitutional practice before the new parliament meets next month after the ruling party lost its majority in the legislature.翻译:台湾行政院院长陈建仁周二表示，在执政党失去立法院多数席位后，内阁将在下个月新立法院召开前按照以往宪法惯例辞职。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 日本东电将于二月下旬开始第四次释放福岛核电站水
item.description: Tokyo Electric Power Company (Tepco) plans to start a fourth release of treated radioactive water from the wrecked Fukushima Daiichi Nuclear Power Plant in late February, an official said on Tuesday, continuing a move criticised by China.翻译:周二，一名官员表示，东京电力公司 (Tepco) 计划于 2 月下旬开始第四次排放受损福岛第一核电站处理过的放射性水，此举继续遭到中国批评。
item.author: Katya Golubkova

item.title: 固态：电动汽车巨头追逐电池的“圣杯”
item.description: Solid-state batteries hold the promise of more energy storage, longer driving ranges and faster charging for next-generation electric vehicles. Yet despite decades of research and billions of dollars invested, their future still looks elusive.翻译:固态电池有望为下一代电动汽车提供更多的能量存储、更长的行驶里程和更快的充电速度。然而，尽管经过数十年的研究和数十亿美元的投资，它们的未来仍然显得难以捉摸。
item.author: Eric Onstad

item.title: 中国总理李克强告诉世界中国正在发展并开放商业
item.description: Chinese Premier Li Qiang said on Tuesday in Davos the Chinese economy was open for business and highlighted its potential for foreign investment as its vast population becomes rapidly more urban and its middle class is forecast to grow.翻译:中国总理李强周二在达沃斯表示，中国经济对商业开放，并强调了中国的外国投资潜力，因为中国庞大的人口迅速城市化，中产阶级预计将增长。
item.author: Antoni Slodkowski

item.title: 大众汽车及其竞争对手正在努力攻克固态电池难题
item.description: Volkswagen, whose drive to develop a "solid-state" electric car battery with U.S. startup QuantumScape has been dogged by delays, is casting its net wider in pursuit of the potentially game-changing technology.翻译:大众汽车与美国初创公司 QuantumScape 合作开发“固态”电动汽车电池的计划一直被拖延，但该公司正在扩大网络，以追求这项可能改变游戏规则的技术。
item.author: Eric Onstad, Paul Lienert

item.title: 新疆雪崩致约1000名游客被困
item.description: The tourists remain stranded in a remote holiday village after avalanches hit China's northwestern Xinjiang region with metres-high snow and fickle weather impeding evacuation.翻译:雪崩袭击了中国西北部的新疆地区，积雪高达数米，天气变化无常，阻碍了疏散，游客们仍被困在一个偏远的度假村里。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国在台湾就职前夕进行等待游戏
item.description: China's muted response to the weekend victory by Taiwan President-elect Lai Ching-te signals what some analysts see as the start of an uneasy four months before he takes office, with Beijing treading carefully before then.翻译:中国对台湾当选总统赖清德周末的胜利反应冷淡，这表明一些分析人士认为，这是他上任前四个月不安的开始，而北京方面在此之前小心行事。
item.author: Laurie Chen, Yew Lun Tian

item.title: 由于利率前景的不安，股市下跌，美元和美国收益率上升
item.description: World shares slipped and the dollar and U.S. bond yields rose on Tuesday as markets reduced bets that global interest rate cuts could come as early as March, partly nudged by hawkish remarks from central bank policy makers in Europe翻译:周二，世界股市下跌，美元和美国债券收益率上涨，原因是市场减少了对全球最早可能在 3 月份降息的押注，部分原因是欧洲央行政策制定者的鹰派言论
item.author: Alun John, Tom Westbrook
